channel.title: I ❤️ DotNet Home Page
channel.description: This is a .NET knowledge sharing platform with live demos crafted by developers for developers with love.

item.title: Blazor WASM Exception Handling and Error Boundary
item.description: In this post I will teach you how exception handling works and how to use error boundary in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Error Logging
item.description: In this post I will teach you how to log error in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Dark Theme and Light Theme
item.description: In this post I will teach you how to toggle dark mode and light mode in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Javascript Interop and Isolation
item.description: In this post I will teach you how to interact with javascript and isolate javascript in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Styles and CSS Isolation
item.description: In this post I will teach you what is CSS isolation and what factors to consider when styling your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Lazy Loading
item.description: In this post I will teach you how to lazy load assemblies in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM App Settings
item.description: In this post I will teach you how to read configuration from app settings in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: Importance of Status Code in Web API
item.description: In this post I will teach you the importance of status code in Web API. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor - SPA from ASP.NET Family
item.description: In this talk I will teach you what is blazor and why do we need to go for blazor. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Introduction
item.description: In this post I will introduce you to Blazor WASM - Single Page Application (SPA) from ASP.NET family. All with live working demo.

item.title: Introducing TDD in C# .Net
item.description: In this post I will introduce you to TDD in C# .NET. All with live working demo.

item.title: Implementing TDD in C# .Net
item.description: In this post I will teach you how to practice and implement TDD in C# .NET. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Components
item.description: In this post I will teach what is components and how to use components in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Event Handling And Event Arguments
item.description: In this post I will teach how to handle events inside components in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Data Binding
item.description: In this post I will teach what is data binding and how to pass data to components in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: OOPS Encapsulation
item.description: In this post I will teach what is encapsulation in object oriented programming. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Controlling Head Content
item.description: In this post I will teach how to control head content in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: OOPS Abstraction
item.description: In this post I will teach what is abstraction in object oriented programming. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Communication Between Components
item.description: In this post I will teach how to communicate between components in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Forms
item.description: In this post I will teach how to use forms in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Forms Validation
item.description: In this post I will teach how to validate data collected in forms in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Virtualization
item.description: In this post I will teach how to use virtualization in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: Introducing Middleware in ASP.NET
item.description: In this post I will introduce you to Middleware in ASP.NET. All with live working demo.

item.title: Types of Middleware in ASP.NET
item.description: In this post I will teach you different types of Middleware in ASP.NET. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Dynamic Component
item.description: In this post I will teach what is dynamic component and how to use dynamic component in your Blazor applications. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Publishing To IIS
item.description: In this post I will teach how to publish your Blazor applications to IIS. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Publishing To GitHub Pages
item.description: In this post I will teach how to publish your Blazor applications to GitHub Pages. All with live working demo.

item.title: Introducing Dependency Injection in .NET
item.description: In this post I will introduce you to Dependency Injection in .NET. All with live working demo.

item.title: Dependency Injection Lifetimes in .NET
item.description: In this post I will teach you Dependency Injection Lifetimes in .NET. All with live working demo.

item.title: Blazor WASM Pre Rendering
item.description: In this post I will teach how to prerender Blazor applications during publish time to improve SEO. All with live working demo.

item.title: LINQ Introduction
item.description: In this post I will introduce you to LINQ in .NET. All with live working demo.

item.title: LINQ Select
item.description: In this post I will teach you how to select data within collections using LINQ in .NET. All with live working demo.

item.title: LINQ OrderBy
item.description: In this post I will teach you how to sort data within collections using LINQ in .NET. All with live working demo.
